A letter from Steve Ballmer and Stephen Elop on Nokia's Web site says, the battle is moving from one of mobile devices to one of mobile ecosystems. Any such ecosystem must include devices beyond smartphones. Internal reactions at Nokia were made apparent when an estimated 1000 employees "walked out" in protest to the announcement.
